_allowlistInfo.details: The Request package through 2.88.2 for Node.js allows a bypass of SSRF mitigations via an attacker-controller server that does a cross-protocol redirect (HTTP to HTTPS, or HTTPS to HTTP)
_allowlistInfo.justification1: Request package is deprecated and unlikely to receive updates.
_allowlistInfo.justification2: Application unaffected as it only talks to kubernetes, which can be asserted as not an attacker-controlled server.
